H0.text: what other movies has tom hardy played in. Mad Max: Fury Road

H1.text: what other movies has tom hardy played in. The Dark Knight Rises

H2.text: what other movies has tom hardy played in. Inception

H3.text: what other movies has tom hardy played in. Warrior

A4.text: He starred as 'Mad' Max Rockatansky in Mad Max: Fury Road.

A5.text: He played the supervillain Bane in The Dark Knight Rises.

A6.text: He played a thief named Eames in Christopher Nolan's science fiction thriller Inception, for which Hardy won a BAFTA Rising Star award.

A7.text: In 2011, Hardy appeared in the film Warrior, which was released on 9 September 2011 by Lionsgate Films.

A8.text: Warrior (2011 film) is an American mixed martial arts film.
